result.eng: The tour was cancelled because of bad weather.
result.ga: Cuireadh an turas ar ceal de bharr drochaimsire
result.orig: Cuireadh an turas ar ceal de bharr drochaimsire
result.html: Cuireadh an turas ar ceal de bharr drochaimsireThe tour was cancelled because of bad weather.
result.ponchtml: Cuireaḋ an turas ar ceal de ḃarr droċaimsireThe tour was cancelled because of bad weather.

result.eng: Because of the amount of information available.
result.ga: De bharr an méid eolais atá le fáil
result.orig: De bharr an méid eolais atá le fáil
result.html: De bharr an méid eolais atá le fáilBecause of the amount of information available.
result.ponchtml: De ḃarr an méid eolais atá le fáilBecause of the amount of information available.

result.eng: You yourself make history with your decisions, your opinions and your actions.
result.ga: Déanann tú féin an stair de bharr do chinntí do thuairimí agus do bhearta
result.orig: Déanann tú féin an stair de bharr do chinntí do thuairimí agus do bhearta
result.html: Déanann tú féin an stair de bharr do chinntí do thuairimí agus do bheartaYou yourself make history with your decisions, your opinions and your actions.
result.ponchtml: Déanann tú féin an stair de ḃarr do ċinntí do ṫuairimí agus do ḃeartaYou yourself make history with your decisions, your opinions and your actions.

result.eng: We couldn't leave the house because of the rain.
result.ga: Ní raibh muid ábalta an teach a fhágáil de bharr na báistí
result.orig: Ní raibh muid ábalta an teach a fhágáil de bharr na báistí
result.html: Ní raibh muid ábalta an teach a fhágáil de bharr na báistíWe couldn't leave the house because of the rain.
result.ponchtml: Ní raiḃ muid ábalta an teaċ a ḟágáil de ḃarr na báistíWe couldn't leave the house because of the rain.

result.eng: We are abandoned here at the top of the mountain.
result.ga: Tá muid tréigthe anseo ar bharr an tsléibhe
result.orig: Tá muid tréigthe anseo ar bharr an tsléibhe
result.html: Tá muid tréigthe anseo ar bharr an tsléibheWe are abandoned here at the top of the mountain.
result.ponchtml: Tá muid tréigṫe anseo ar ḃarr an tsléiḃeWe are abandoned here at the top of the mountain.

result.eng: The hills looked dark and lonely with a cloud of fog lying on the top of the mountain.
result.ga: Bhí dreach dorcha uaigneach ar na cnoic agus scamall ceo ina luí ar bharr an tsléibhe
result.orig: Bhí dreach dorcha uaigneach ar na cnoic agus scamall ceo ina luí ar bharr an tsléibhe
result.html: Bhí dreach dorcha uaigneach ar na cnoic agus scamall ceo ina luí ar bharr an tsléibheThe hills looked dark and lonely with a cloud of fog lying on the top of the mountain.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí dreaċ dorċa uaigneaċ ar na cnoic agus scamall ceo ina luí ar ḃarr an tsléiḃeThe hills looked dark and lonely with a cloud of fog lying on the top of the mountain.

result.eng: Up I went to room 1026 at the top of the house.
result.ga: Suas liom go seomra 1026 ar bharr an tí
result.orig: Suas liom go seomra 1026 ar bharr an tí
result.html: Suas liom go seomra 1026 ar bharr an tíUp I went to room 1026 at the top of the house.
result.ponchtml: Suas liom go seomra 1026 ar ḃarr an tíUp I went to room 1026 at the top of the house.

result.eng: Because of these developments, the citizen now had a toolbox that gave him the chance to function as a journalist, globally and at little cost.
result.ga: De bharr na bhforbairtí seo bhí bosca uirlisí cumarsáide ag an saoránach a thug deis dó feidhmiú mar iriseoir ar bhonn domhanda agus ar bheagán costais
result.orig: De bharr na bhforbairtí seo bhí bosca uirlisí cumarsáide ag an saoránach a thug deis dó feidhmiú mar iriseoir ar bhonn domhanda agus ar bheagán costais
result.html: De bharr na bhforbairtí seo bhí bosca uirlisí cumarsáide ag an saoránach a thug deis dó feidhmiú mar iriseoir ar bhonn domhanda agus ar bheagán costaisBecause of these developments, the citizen now had a toolbox that gave him the chance to function as a journalist, globally and at little cost.
result.ponchtml: De ḃarr na ḃforbairtí seo ḃí bosca uirlisí cumarsáide ag an saoránaċ a ṫug deis dó feiḋmiú mar iriseoir ar ḃonn doṁanda agus ar ḃeagán costaisBecause of these developments, the citizen now had a toolbox that gave him the chance to function as a journalist, globally and at little cost.
